quality.notes: This will set the default character sheet atribute for all pilot skills to INT

quality.name: Logical Gunner
quality.notes: This will set the default character sheet atribute for the gunnery skill to LOG

quality.name: Purity Bonus (Adept)
quality.notes: If ever your Magic rating changes, you must remove and re-add this quality to ensure your power points are properly calculated.

quality.name: Underworld Soldier
quality.notes:
As we do not use the rules for Group contacts, this quality provides a Connection 4, Loyalty 3 Contact that has a +2 bonus on availability tests to acquire gear they have a proficiency in.
The player is expected to be fairly open about their allegiances; visible tattoos are a common choice. Whether this presents an advantage or disadvantage in a given situation is up to the GM; it is expected that a known and favored member of a Syndicate will face greater fear, respect, admiration and revulsion than the average criminal or runner.

quality.name: Valkyrie Wings
quality.notes: This quality can only be taken by Valkyries. These wings give the Valkyrie a flying speed of 2/6/+2. This character requires metahuman adjustment to properly use vehicles without a -1 like Dwarves and Elves.

quality.name: Pixie Stature
quality.notes: This quality can only be taken by Pixies. Pixies can only use weapons that could normally be used one handed (i.e. Knives, Short Swords, Small Axes, Clubs, Batons, Maces with the exception of the Osmium Maces, Whips, Chakrams, Shields, Grenades, Pistols, SMGs, and Bows) but that have to two hand these weapons. So they treat these weapons like two handed weapons for them, needing Iaijutsu to quickdraw the blades and treating the holsters for the guns as slings. In addition, they raise the concealability of all of their items and weapons by +6 for the purposes of trying to palm them and hide them on their person.

quality.name: Transmorphism
quality.notes: This quality can only be taken by Dalakitnon. This allows the Dalakitnon to change their appearance to a different gender version of themselves over the course of a minute. This transformation requires concentration and makes them look like a version of themselves as the gender identity they choose to express but does not make them magically shape shift into another person. An outsider may confuse them with a sibling or family member of the gender expression they were familiar with if they met the Dalakitnon while they take a different form.
